movie_title: The Never Ending Race to Build High
introduction: Visit http://brilliant.org/neo/ to get started learning STEM for free, and the first 200 people will

vocabulary.example: The architect's design for the new skyscraper was brilliant.

vocabulary.definition: to remove from a position of power or authority
vocabulary.example: Several new projects aimed to dethrone the Burj Khalifa as the tallest building.

vocabulary.definition: disagreement or argument about a particular issue
vocabulary.example: The decision to measure building height led to a lot of controversy.

vocabulary.definition: data points that are significantly different from other observations
vocabulary.example: The Empire State Building's height increase was an outlier compared to previous records.
The economic viability of mega-tall buildings is a key consideration for investors.

vocabulary.definition: doubt as to the truth of something
vocabulary.example: There was skepticism about the completion of the new tallest building project.
